Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: I heard you built {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} a house... That's really generous...#$b#You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...#$e#*ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I heard someone bought {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} a house... *sigh*... What did {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} ever do to earn that kind of generosity??
Entries.dumped_Guys: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} has a glazed look in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} eye. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} won't speak to you.
Entries.event_room1: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} for advice next time I see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} at the saloon.$s
Entries.Wed8: I guess I've grown attached to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}}. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.#$e#I never really had much of a family as a kid.$s
Entries.JojaMart: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}'s hard at work. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.Fri4: $d Joja#What's the point of life if all you do is work?|I haven't been able to pay my rent, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky.
Entries.Sat4: $d Joja#I'm renting my room from {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.|If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.
Entries.Sat8: I've really grown attached to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s chickens.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} are doing alright without me.#$e#I'm not too worried... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} is old enough now to take care of the animals on her own.
Entries.Good_2: The name '{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.
Entries.Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} on one of her bad days. Go away.$a
Entries.fall_15: I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.$6
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}}.$6
Entries.OneKid_3: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pa:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}}{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pa:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age.
Entries.Good_6: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} could need.$h

Entries.marriage_Fri.002: If I don't order a cold one now and then, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} will go out of business. I'm just doing my civic duty. I'll head home around 10.
Entries.winter_15.000: I'm taking a night off from the saloon for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}}' sake...

BeforeMovie.Text: Heh. I'm actually interested in seeing this one...

AfterMovie.Text: When you're watching a good movie, you can forget about everything else... That's a gift.

BeforeMovie.Text: Ugh... this is going to be painful.
